name: Qdrant Vector DB
description: Qdrant vector database integration for memory storage

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.help: Qdrant Cloud API key (optional for local)

collectionName.label: Collection Name
collectionName.help: Name of the collection to use

distance.label: Distance Metric
distance.help: Similarity metric: Cosine, Euclid, or Dot

onDiskPayload.label: On-Disk Payload
onDiskPayload.help: Store payload on disk instead of RAM
